overview.tax_residency_rules: 183-day rule or permanent home in Hungary.
overview.currency_exchange_rules: The Hungarian Forint is fully convertible, but large transactions may require prior approval from the Central Bank of Hungary.

personal_income_tax.exemptions: Certain allowances and deductions are available.
personal_income_tax.social_security: 18.5% of salary (shared between employer and employee).

corporate_tax.deductions: Various deductions are allowed, including R&D expenses and depreciation.

capital_gains_tax.exemptions: Gains from the sale of primary residence are exempt if the proceeds are reinvested in another primary residence within one year.

vat_gst.exemptions: Certain goods and services are exempt, such as healthcare, education, and financial services.

property_tax.rate: 0.3-0.5% of assessed value (depending on property type).
property_tax.exemptions: Primary residence under a certain value may be exempt.

inheritance_tax.exemptions: Spouse, lineal descendants and ascendants, certain charitable organizations.

special_economic_zones.name: Budapest Airport Enterprise Zone
special_economic_zones.tax_incentives: Reduced corporate tax rate, property tax exemptions, customs duty exemptions.
